alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Johnston; Marshall; McClain; Murray; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Johnston, eastern Garvin, southeastern Carter, western Pontotoc, northwestern Marshall, Murray and southeastern McClain Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Davis to 4 miles northeast of Gene Autry to 4 miles east of Lake Murray. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Sulphur, Davis, Stratford, Dickson, Mannsville, Roff, Ravia, Mill Creek, Fitzhugh, Dougherty, Gene Autry, Hickory, Vanoss, Lake Of The Arbuckles, Reagan, Scullin, Russett, and Turner Falls. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 49 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Garvin; Johnston; Marshall; McClain; Murray; Pontotoc
